actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of genetic characteristics, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends title VII (Equal Employment Opportunity) of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to make it an unlawful employment practice to discriminate against any individual on the basis of genetic characteristics.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of genetic characteristics, and for other purposes.
